# UITabBarItem.SystemItem

**Enumeration**

Constants that represent the system tab bar items.

## Declaration

```swift
enum SystemItem
```

## System items

- **UITabBarItem.SystemItem.bookmarks**: The bookmarks system item.
- **UITabBarItem.SystemItem.contacts**: The contacts system item.
- **UITabBarItem.SystemItem.downloads**: The downloads system item.
- **UITabBarItem.SystemItem.favorites**: The favorites system item.
- **UITabBarItem.SystemItem.featured**: The featured system item.
- **UITabBarItem.SystemItem.history**: The history system item.
- **UITabBarItem.SystemItem.more**: The more system item.
- **UITabBarItem.SystemItem.mostRecent**: The most recent system item.
- **UITabBarItem.SystemItem.mostViewed**: The most viewed system item.
- **UITabBarItem.SystemItem.recents**: The recents system item.
- **UITabBarItem.SystemItem.search**: The search system item.
- **UITabBarItem.SystemItem.topRated**: The top rated system item.

## Initializers

- **init(rawValue:)**

## Creating a tab bar item

- **init(tabBarSystemItem:tag:)**: Creates a tab bar item using a system-provided configuration.
- **init(title:image:tag:)**: Creates a tab bar item that displays a title and an image.
- **init(title:image:selectedImage:)**: Creates a tab bar item that toggles the image it displays when its selected state changes.
- **init()**: Creates a tab bar item with a default configuration.
- **init(coder:)**: Creates a tab bar item from a serialized instance.

## Conforms To

- BitwiseCopyable
- Equatable
- Hashable
- RawRepresentable
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
